content:
I am currently preparing for my clinical informatics board examination, which will consist of multiple-choice questions. I am going to ask you 86 multiple-choice questions. When I present a question and its corresponding answer options to you, please respond with the letter of the answer you believe to be correct, along with an explanation of why you think that answer is correct. Additionally, please provide an explanation for why the other answer options are not correct. For each question, please also indicate which level of Bloom's Taxonomy it corresponds to (e.g., Knowledge, Comprehension, Application, Analysis, Synthesis, Evaluation)

Physicians are distinguished from other providers of medical care in that physicians
a. Can be sued for medical malpractice.
b. May perform complex surgical operations.
c. Must complete Continuing Education courses after graduation.
d. Possess doctoral degrees.
